name: MissionChiefMetrics
short: A cog for keeping track of player's vehicle stats and other things from the game MissionChief.
description: This cog allows players to keep track of their vehicle stats and other important information from the game MissionChief.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data persistently.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing MCM!
Please report any bugs/log output in *#support_other-cogs* on the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk).
author: crayyy_zee
